Title: 🔁🖼 🔻 Mes Kerman club introduced Ali Samere as the new head coa...
Description: Forwarded From Iran International Sports Club Mes Kerman introduced Ali Samere as the new head coach. This is while Qasim Shahba was introduced as the head coach of Mes. Title: 🎬 The nurses of Yazd protested against the non-payment of their ...
Description: On Monday, Yazd nurses held a protest rally in Sadouqi Hospital to protest against the non-payment of their demands. They protested against forced overtime, low salaries, tariffs and non-implementation of laws, hard work and many shifts from being at work. They refused. @iraninltv

Title: 🖼 Mohammad Javad Zarif confirmed on his X account that one of th...
Description: Mohammad Javad Zarif confirmed on his X account that one of the reasons for his resignation was the objections to his children's foreign citizenship, and at the same time he added that no institution opposed his appointment as deputy leader. A peculiarity of the law approved in 1401, they had turned my employment in sensitive jobs into an excuse to put pressure on the 14th government - and he also resigned from the strategic deputy position of physicians last week to avoid any suspicions or excuses for disrupting the work of the government.

Title: 🖼 Ali Abdul Alizadeh, the head of the election headquarters of M...
Description: In response to a question about his assessment of the proposed cabinet of doctors, Ali Abdul Alizadeh, the head of the election headquarters of Masoud Mezikian, told the parliament: -I don't know most of them, so I don't have a special assessment.- He wished success to the proposed ministers.

Title: 🎬 The head of Nowshahr fire department announced the fire in Now...
Description: The head of Nowshahr Fire Department announced the fire in Nowshahr Hospital and said that the equipment on the second floor of this hospital, especially the ICU, was burnt. He called the cause of the fire - electrical connection and added that there were no casualties.

Title: 🎬 The Iranian LGBT Plus community in Montreal, Canada on Sunday,...
Description: The Iranian LGBT+ community in Montreal, Canada, participated in the pride parade of queer people in this city on Sunday, August 21, with the slogan - woman, life, freedom. The attendees demanded an end to executions in Iran by showing the photo of Reza Rasaei, an executed protester. In this parade, the participants also displayed designs of the lily flower proposed by a group of queer activists and artists as a symbol of the queer movement in Iran. Video is too big
